description:
TEN is a challenging platformer in which you face a relentless gauntlet of ten-second deathtrap rooms in a desperate struggle to escape your fate and uncover the truth!

Collect tokens, purchase upgrades and learn how to overcome each floorâ€™s onslaught of saw blades, cannon fire, lasers, bizarre monsters and more. Every room is a test. Every death is a lesson. Evolve and master every obstacle as you die, try, die and try again.

Conquer various environments and triumph over escalating threats, challenges, and deadly bosses as you make your way to the surface - and to your freedom.

Features
* Frantic 2D indie platforming action
* A rewarding and satisfying challenge that will put your skills to the test
* An epic, adrenaline fuelled original soundtrack by the legends at dBXY
* Includes accessibility mode to avoid damage for a relaxed gameplay
name: TEN
